dcterms:creator: A. Reddy
S. Gopal
R. Cutler
dcterms:description: The DNS 2020 no-reverb test set is used for evaluating speech enhancement models, specifically focusing on the performance of models in noise-free environments.
dcterms:title: DNS 2020 no-reverb test set

dcterms:creator: A. Dubey
et al.
dcterms:description: The dataset provided by the Deep Noise Suppression Challenge at ICASSP 2023 is used to generate training data containing noise, synthesizing clean and noisy speech pairs.
dcterms:title: Dataset provided by Deep Noise Suppression (DNS) Challenge at ICASSP 2023
